mapper.select: SELECT am.m_name as mname, am.m_uri as muri, am.m_fatherId as fatherid, am.m_re as remark FROM agt_menu AS am WHERE am.m_fatherId=1 and am.m_fatherId < am.mid

SELECT am.mid as id, am.m_name as mname, am.m_uri as muri, am.m_fatherId as fatherid, am.m_re as remark FROM agt_menu AS am LEFT JOIN rel_role_menu AS rrm ON am.mid=rrm.menu_id where rrm.role_id=#{roleId}
